metadata.title: RA8E1 Entry Line MCU Package Options

sections.content:
Question:
What package options are available for the RA8E1 Group MCUs?
Answer:
The RA8E1 Group MCUs are available in 100LQFP and 144LQFP packages with 0.5mm pitch .
Suitable Products
RA8E1
